sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Adding the test set snapshot information in nlu_batch_test_run_execution</description>
        <name>NLU Batch Test - Add test set snapshot</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[var tables = NLUWorkbenchConstants.tables;

(function() {
    var batchTestRunExecGr = new GlideRecord(tables.NLU_BATCH_TEST_RUN_EXECUTION);
    batchTestRunExecGr.query();
    while (batchTestRunExecGr.next()) {
        try {
            var testDefinition = new sn_nlu_workbench.NLUBatchTestDefinition(batchTestRunExecGr.test_run_definition);
            var testSnapshot = testDefinition.getTestSetSnapshot();
            batchTestRunExecGr.setValue('test_set_snapshot', JSON.stringify(testSnapshot));
            batchTestRunExecGr.update();
        } catch (e) {
            gs.error('Error while updating the test set snapshot in NLU_BATCH_TEST_RUN_EXECUTION table for the record ' + batchTestRunExecGr.getUniqueValue() + ' ' + e.message);
        }
    }

})();]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2021-04-07 07:56:55</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>58691836c31320100bf407720f40dd13</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>NLU Batch Test - Add test set snapshot</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="NLU Workbench - Advanced Features" source="sn_nlu_workbench">31f5f491c3a710100bf407720f40ddf4</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="NLU Workbench - Advanced Features">31f5f491c3a710100bf407720f40ddf4</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_58691836c31320100bf407720f40dd13</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2021-06-20 16:27:16</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
sys_metadata_link.sys_name: NLU Batch Test - Add test set snapshot
